knimeNode.name: QCTICReader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads QC Total Ion Current (TIC) information from a CSV file generated with the QCExporter.

fullDescription.intro: Reads QC Total Ion Current (TIC) information from a CSV file generated with the QCExporter.

ports.inPort: CSV file containing the QC Total Ion Current (TIC) information created by the QCExporter.
ports.outPort: Table containing the QC Total Ion Current (TIC) information.
